resources.string: Welcome ! This is a small tutorial to guide you through the app.
This will be the time that the timer uses for the countdown.
You can adjust the time by dragging the outer circle.
Click here, when you are ready to sit!
You will receive a notification when this timer hits 0.
Notice here that we know when you are walking! We will freeze the timer if you are walking and we will reset it again once you are seated again.
Be sure to enable the movement sensors in the settings.
Click here, when you are ready to stop.
